WorkItem.Description:
Hi, this is a great tool. However, I have a problem when writing the report to excel. It seems to hang showing the following:

Convert-SqlServerInventoryClixmlToExcel
   Writing inventory to Excel (Go get a coffee, this can take a few minutes...)
   [ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo                         ]
  Writing SQL Server Inventory To Excel
     Writing Database Engine Database Objects To Excel
     [oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo                                                ]
    Export-SqlServerInventoryDatabaseEngineDbObjectsToExcel
       Applying formatting to Worksheet #34
       [ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo                     ]
I waited 30 minutes and still the same. Any ideas ??
